website_summaries.verdict: Despite its battery life, this laptop provides plenty of power for getting work done, running multiple apps, and playing your favorite PC games.
pros: Easily handles multitasking and basic gaming
cons: Topping out at 7.5 hours of battery life on a full charge is underwhelming

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY from Microsoft 10S!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BE AWARE: This computer has Microsoft 10S. This is scam software by Microsoft to force you to use only Microsoft apps from their deserted island wasteland of an app store. The computer will not allow you to do anything else. You can upgrade to a full version of Microsoft 10... for another $134. Hard pass. STAY AWAY from ALL computers with Microsoft 10S!! Absolute garbage software.
customer_reviews.author: vikingpiper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Deal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a fantastic deal for the price. The laptop uses the same body as the $500+ Acer Aspire 5 models which is to say it is a fantastic body that is light and compact and very portable. Ram can easily be upgraded and adding a 2.5" SSD allows for additional memory over the 128gb included on the computer. The keyboard is comfortable to type on and as a bonus still includes a full numpad even if it is a bit cramped. The screen is a solid IPS screen and when you consider the price tag is amazing and beats a lot of the more expensive laptop screens I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rosewill

customer_reviews.title: 5 star laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Good entry level laptop. Latest gen ryzen picasso at the time of this review. Good for basic functions at this price point. Comes with m.2 128 gb drive with room for another SSD. Win 10 is a giant pain in the rear, particularly "S" mode, which can be opted out of.
customer_reviews.author: dragon_eye

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for Microsoft glitch that prevents you from leaving safe mode😑🙄
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for my son’s birthday. As he starts playing with it, we realize it’s in safe mode and he’s not able to download or open the products he wants to use. Microsoft says it’s a glitch in their system and we need to wait for them to work it out. Amazon says they will replace with another unit, but they can’t guarantee that unit won’t have the same issue. So, here we are with a brand new computer, unused. Huge let down. Disappointing product with disappointing options to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Choate

customer_reviews.title: Thin. Easy to upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Thin and light. Aluminum case looks good. The system run smoothly with ssd. The original ram is samsung 2666 4gb. I upgraded ram with other brand and still ok. sata is empty.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Beware 10S
customer_reviews.text: Beware of Windows 10s. I’ve been on live chat with Microsoft for 4 hours trying to install Windows 10 home! I have no idea about the computer yet, but the safe mode is a huge problem!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen E. Piccony

customer_reviews.title: Could not set it up
customer_reviews.text: this machine kept telling me that i am underage. could not find the windows product code. 4 amazon people just made it worse. i don't know what is wrong but it is driving me out of my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Does not support games
customer_reviews.text: It freezes while you are using it. It does not support games
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Mateer-Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Revised Review, a few months later:  Very happy with PC
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a negative review (below) when I first bought this PC, citing its useless bloatware from Microsoft and its partners. I was also frustrated initially by slow page loads, until I realized that the PC was going through lengthy software updates. Since then (after removing the bloatware and getting past the updates), I've had a very positive impression of this PC, liking its screen, its keyboard, and even its performance, which is acceptably fast (not super fast).
customer_reviews.author: New York Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star just because Windows 10 S-Mode by default....
customer_reviews.text: Why Acer install this version of Windows 10 with forced S-mode?? Shame on you Microsoft & Acer! Forcing people to sign-up with an email or phone number to even log into this laptop.... Then you cannot install any apps that are not in Microsoft store, and you have to use Edge that uses Bing only. You can turn this off, but only after you have provided your person information. No command prompt either while in S mode. Wow just wow.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU HAVE MANY HOURS TO SPEND GETTING IT INSTALLED CORRECTLY
customer_reviews.text: As I write this I am on the phone with Microsoft attempting to get multiple issues resolved. I have now spent mores than 6 SIX hours in 5 different times. First they tool it out of the S mode but issues still hang on like having to sign into EVERYTHING MULTIPLE TIMES, over and over and over again. It is enough that you want to throw something. I am about to hang up now because I have been on hold for 9 minutes THIS time.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY HOOGERWERF

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare, buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop, based on reviews and rank as bestseller, and this is where my nightmare began. The laptop froze after turning on the power, tried contacting acer (that's what's advised in the package)who referred me to Microsoft who referred me to Amazon (total approx 2 hrs). I then insisted on a refund after amazon said there was nothing they could do and wanted to refer me to some other department. I am now wondering about all these good reviews or maybe I got a faulty machine.
customer_reviews.author: sassey Edward

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Ad stated that I would receive 1 year free subscription to Microsoft Office. When delivered, it changed to 1 month. Now, when I view my order the ad doesn't say anything about Microsoft Office being included. This was the main reason I purchased this lap top.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: S mode is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Despite hours wasted in numerous conversations with Microsoft support, I am unable to switch out of S mode. For those fortunate enough to not know what that is, S mode basically gives your computer the capabilities of a smart phone. I can’t install Firefox. I can’t even open to command prompt. Hopefully, I will be able to return this computer. If not, I will he forced to spend $140 on an installation of Windows 10 Home that is not in Suck mode.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Torrey

customer_reviews.title: I bought a NEW computer, but the one I got was REFURBISHED
customer_reviews.text: The computer I received had the personal information of a previous user. If I wanted a used computer, I would have bought a better one for a better price. I got a full refund, but I want the other potential buyers to know. Also the mouse pad broke within the first two weeks. Worst purchase ever. THIS IS NOT A NEW COMPUTER. IT IS USED
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I got this 4 days ago. Charged it, set it up, played around a little bit that night. Last night the touch pad and the mouse froze up. Spent hours on my phone trying to find a solution. Called support several times last night and this morning, and always says Circuits are busy. For what ever reason, this morning the touchpad and mouse are working now. All the reviews I read said the speakers are great. False, you can't hear anything. I will be returning this. The only way you can return it through Amazon is if it's unopened and not used. I will update on how this process goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy Quality & Warranty Impractical to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my 4th grader for online school in the pandemic . It offers quite a lot for a very low price; though I didn't expect the TouchPad to stop working three months after purchasing and I did not expect Acer's Customer Service to be virtually no help. To get the TouchPad repaired I have to send it off to their center in Texas and the kicker is it will take 30 days. Pray tell how does my 4th grader attend online classes those 30 days? I will have it repaired at my own cost. Way to go Acer! Provide your customers a warranty they will never be able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Blackperlz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good computer even though storage is low.but for 350 you can't expect everything. It runs good with very little hiccups. A good basic computer but better than most in this price range. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Your mom loves me

customer_reviews.title: Trash computer from a trash company
customer_reviews.text: Brand new computer won't take a charge or turn on after 93 days. I'm outside of Amazons return window so they tell me sorry and the manufacturer wants me to ship it to them (on my dime) and wait a month. How can computer I've never traveled with or dropped and rarely use only last 3 months? I'd pay the fee extra $ and get one from somewhere else. It was slow from day 1 and all I do are websites and a few excel sheets. This computer is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience. Yet.
customer_reviews.text: Had great success with Acer in the past. This was my first subpar experience. Laptop screen had shortage out of the box. This should justify a new replacement but they made me send it back for repair. Haven’t received it back yet so the jury is out.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: worst computer i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: what a piece of garbage! I have never had a computer so useless as this one. I don't think I've had such slow response since dial up. i'll admit it was cheap but I never expected such poor quality. I am not a gamer I do not run any type of advanced programs. I play very simple games, I watch Netflix, email, facebook etc, very basic stuff. well let the buyer beware. at least now I know to stay away from acer and anyone who would sell such a shoddy product as this. I will certainly note this seller and stay away, not that the seller cares i'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acer's Manufacturers Warranty is at best a sham, at worst a scam..
customer_reviews.text: Acer Maufacturers Warranty service is at best a sham at worst a scam. We purchased a computer for our 8 year old. During COVID, a stressful time for all us, my 8 year old used it for remote learning. After 8 months the screen went black. As directed by Acer Service we payed $60.00 to ship it to Acer for repair under the warranty. They told us the damage was not covered under the warranty and charged us almost $260.00 for the repair. There was not a scratch on the screen. Completely dishonorable service.
customer_reviews.author: Samira Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic computer. UPDATE; it's junk.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Battery life not what's stated. It's about half. For the price it's good. Love the backlit keyboard. Don't use it for gaming so I have no idea what it would be like.UPDATE: Backlit now no longer working. Crashes often. Piece of junk. Don't waste your money. Does not act as a new computer. UPDATE 12/9/19 It's junk.
customer_reviews.author: suziQ

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My relatively new Chromebook fell apart and I needed a replacement. I wasn’t real happy with the serious limitations of the Chromebook so I caved and went with Windows 10. It requires a lot of customization and tweaking but it’s ok once you get it streamlined. This comes with S Mode which is the very first thing I got rid of. Fortunately all you need to do is go to the Microsoft Store and search for S Mode. You can undo it in about 2 seconds. The display is very nice. Sound is decent. For $350 this is a great deal. My girlfriend is even considering getting one.
customer_reviews.author: The Contingency Plan

customer_reviews.title: A lot of features for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality, easy to use. I did a fair amount of research before buying; I had certain features that I wanted but wanted to stay under $500--not easy to do if you want a versatile, quality product. I read a lot of reviews by techies and customer feedback. This brand/model came up frequently as a lot of bang for the buck. I've been using it for several weeks now and have not been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MattieC

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My mac met the true death unexpectedly so I needed a new comp quick! Most for working at home & playing Sims :) So far this laptop has been great! Especially for the price. There is only 1 drive but with my Sims 4 and expansions downloaded I still have like 50 GB of free space. The camera isn't the greatest. I feel like an android user on conference calls. See pic below. The photo quality is actually a little better than the video quality. I love the backlit keyboard and side number pad!! Lightweight & beautiful! I would buy it again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with my Acer
customer_reviews.text: I am a "senior" that is not a techie so I can't share any technical information. I purchased my Acer to be able to take professional courses to renew my licenses through Zoom (my desktop does not have a camera or microphone). The only extra purchase I made was 8GB of memory. I am super happy with my Acer ! The camera seems to be awesome compared to that of others in my Zoom & Webex classes. The face photos of the other participants are dark ... mine is perfectly clear. Besides for "Zooming," I plan to use it for traveling. For all other uses, I will continue using my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Overheats
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure whether mine is defective or what. Basic desktop activities and internet browsing is fine, but once I start watching a video for example, the fan kicks in pretty loud. Loaded up League of Legends, lowest settings, and after 2 minutes in a match, the whole thing just shuts down. This is a consistent behavior, happens 100% of the time. The graphics drivers and acer’s firmware are all up-to-date. I’ve reached out to Acer, who want me to send it in for repair. Not a great first experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Richardson

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Won't Charge 6mo later
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December. The computer in May, 6 months later, no longer holds a charge. I have ordered a new charger to see if this is the problem and so we will see but all the reviews made me think this was a great value. The socket items not wiggly or anything, the computer just no longer charges.
customer_reviews.author: Kandelina

customer_reviews.title: Windows operating system is “non-genuine”.
customer_reviews.text: Windows is in S mode, cannot download anything. BEWARE! Every time I try to takeout of safe mode it says the windows license isn’t valid. I keep getting a message that the window 10 operating system is “non genuine”. This is fraudulent. Do not buy this without understanding what this is. We do not and are filing a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Niles

customer_reviews.title: Acer warranty is useless
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was useable, the screen can flash black when it struggles to perform basic tasks, like browse Facebook or scroll through youtubes homepage or even watching a video. I've had this for less than a year, and due to an accident involving a dog, the screen is broke, and Acers warranty won't cover that so they want 250$ for a 300$ laptop to replace the screen. Don't get Acer products if you want to rely on a warranty or even if you want to repair something that shouldn't cost 80% the price of the unit, Acer sucks
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lapierre

customer_reviews.title: NO CAMERA DRIVER, PIECE OF JUNK NOW NO REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: THIS MACHINE CAME WITH NO CAMERA DRIVERS. NOW ACER HUNG UP ON ME. AMAZON CAN'T REPLACE IT. PIECE OF JUNK. LOST MY MONEY. STILL HAS NO CAMERA DRIVERS. STILL CAN'T USE FOR ZOOM. VERY UNHAPPY CUSTOMER. LOST HOURS OF MY TIME TRYING TO FIX THIS. HOURS. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: PissedOff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a delay but gladly they made it on time. The product is super smooth and well packed. The specifications of the product has meet my expectation and it was a fantastic brand. I would highly recommend this laptop as it an example of best buy. As far as the functionality is concerned, it has provided a fast and high quality of services and it really fit the budget even if I'm from Philippines but the product really exceeds the price. I can say that when you buy this laptop, you will surely love to buy again of the same kind. Thanks Amazon for my first experience buying in your platform. You've done a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Marie O. Batula

customer_reviews.title: Battery's not good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this laptop - considering its price, it would be unrealistic. But one of the criteria to make a final decision when buying this particular item, was a battery life - it was promised at least 8 hr of off-wire. Ok, in the very beginning it would stay on for 7.5 hr (I checked), but 4 months passed and - it barely stays 3 hr or less. Also, when the laptop is on, the bottom part in the upper middle heats up too much - I guess it is where the battery is located.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this laptop is top notch. The screen is a nice size. There are a copule things that bother me however. The sound is not very loud and sometimes the CPU is slow to respond. The quality of the sound is good though and the CPU does respond quickly most of the time so I can't really fault the machine too much. I really love the how thin and sleek the machine itself is. One thing I would have liked is to have a Blu Ray reader for my old BluRay and DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: Russ C

customer_reviews.title: For 10 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters 10th bday, she uses an iPhone, iPad, and desktop to play games. She is a very fast typer and very adept with technical things (when it has to do with a game of course). I got the extra 4GB of RAM as recommended, installed with ease, and it runs fast. Decent priced laptop with a beautiful FULL HD screen, everything checked out good on benchmarking especially graphics as this has its own dedicated chip for graphics, unlike the integrated 630's you see, which do not do much, as in there is no video editing etc, but with this one, shes all good!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sunther

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I got this system for my son who just wanted a computer to play Sims 4 and watch YouTube videos and Netflix. I had to disable Windows S-mode in order to download Origin and Sims 4. I spent about an hour setting up this laptop and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael L Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids. It’s nice and smooth. I installed Manjaro Linux on it and it worked out of the box with default settings. The laptop is good enough to play Minecraft for hours. It works great for other things too. Cons: The hardware is very sensitive. The right hinge connecting the screen to the keyboard has bent/warped already. I tried to fix it using black insulation tape, but I don’t know how long it would hold. I was planning to buy one more, but changed my mind after this.
customer_reviews.author: Arul John

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Owned this laptop for two months before the screen died. Acer said that fixing the screen was an out-of-warranty repair, despite the fact that the laptop was never once dropped or had any damage done to it by me (probably to get out of having to eat the cost of the repair). To have them repair it out of warranty would have cost more than the price of just buying a new laptop, so now it is junk. A complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for our children's schoolwork during the pandemic, and it's held up remarkably well to kids that are less-than-gentle to their electronics. My wife is able to use it for general work-related tasks as well and is beefy enough to handle it while being lightweight enough that it's not a chore to lug around. If you're hoping to play intensive games or other powerful programs on it, this probably isn't the laptop for you, but for general everyday purposes it does the job quite well.
customer_reviews.author: StuJ

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHEAP LAPTOP
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop on prime day for roughly 250ish after using rewards points and deal of the day. i put a second ssd into i had lying around and a second stick of ram for a total of 8 gigs this display is easily the best part of this machine. i put world of warcraft on it and with every thing turned down pretty low it runs at an average of 40 fps at 1080p in lfr raid situation. for this price you cannot come close to something like this anywhere else it's simply beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This laptop had problems the minute I started the setup. Most of the issues were with Windows 10, but the processor was slow as well. After several hours of useless effort on my part, I called Acer Support. They were helpful, but after more than an hour, unable to resolve the issues. I was ultimately directed to reset the system. Needless to say, the problems didn't bode well and I sent this disaster of a machine back.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but sound sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say on all the detail about gigs and speed. I dont understand why anyone would not upgrade from Windows 10S. It was free for me to upgrade. I got it because I use Zoom a lot for meetings and the computer format is better than tablet/phone format. Visually it works really well for that. My only complaint is the speaker location. The two speakers are located on the bottom front lip. When trying to use Zoom I can't always hear what people are saying (their microphones arent good/loud enough) even if my volume is at 95%.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 9 months....
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! Bought this Acer in January 2020. It is now September 2020, and after only 9 months, the monitor has died. If I hook up the HDMI to another monitor, I can see a distorted display. I was told by a computer tech that it is the second time he has seen a display chip like this die, which was NOT intel . He said it was not worth fixing and next laptop I buy should be an Intel processor with a solid state hard drive. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Change my 4 years old Acer for a new one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop do my 8 year old son. It doesn’t have a lot of storage space and is only 4Gb of RAM. But is enough for him to do his homework and play Roblox. Later on I plan to do some upgrades. But the computer is fast and works perfectly for his needs. Is a beautiful computer in all the aspects. I am a acer user for more then 4 years now. And I love it. Acer makes really good products. Very durable and I don’t expect less from this new one I bought. Will keep updating my comment as it needs.
customer_reviews.author: rafaela

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but problems!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but problems with this laptop. Within 5 weeks of receiving it, the screen went out and I had to send it into Acer to be fixed. Next, found out the camera DOESN'T FUNCTION. At all. Even took it to my local computer tech and he couldn't figure out what was going on. And then just this weekend, the screen went out. AGAIN. Don't waste your time with this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: jellisknowles

customer_reviews.title: NO BOOT DEVICE?
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of use that message was all that appeared on the screen after the Acer logo. Sent back to Amazon; they've had it back since the 25th. So Far NO refund. No comment as to whether they had removed ALL the personal data including BOTH our banking and order placing links of both my wife and myself.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Pursell, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for average office user
customer_reviews.text: Great Price, Nice large screen size , light weight, good keyboard tactile action. The built-in Ethernet plug is a bit weird so you may want to get a USB-Ethernet plug. This runs Microsoft office 365 and Norton AV without any drama. Like other reviewers said, first thing you do is log out of the Microsoft APP store so you can install software without buying through Microsoft. Instructions are easily available via web search. Need more storage? It’s easy to upgrade with SSD drive.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent if you upgrade RAM, but speakers are weak
customer_reviews.text: Worst audio volume of any laptop I have ever owned. Just know you will either way headphones or purchase speakers for this device. Otherwise, it's pretty awesome laptop. I upgraded the RAM to the max and it's wicked fast. I am starting to hate Microsoft though. Did you know you can no longer auto save with microsoft work to you hard drive? You have to save it to their cloud which is limited in space.... Remember when you could just auto save to your own computer. Those days are gone. I try to not use Microsoft apps whenever possible because of crap like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri V Vanschaick

customer_reviews.title: ok laptop
customer_reviews.text: my likes.... cheap... decent picture... my unlikes.... only dual core.. only 4 gig of ram..making it pretty slow..............................this isnt for gaming...... if u just wanta browsing laptopcheck email you tube this is for u..
customer_reviews.author: rcracers

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: Super fast. Very easy to use. Super light. A totally different from my old laptop. I'm a 75 year old and use mainly for communicating and web surfing. I didn't think a laptop would be as much fun as my smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING laptop & the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.text: Best value for a laptop on amazon by far. If you spend $30 to double the RAM then you have a full-functioning amazing laptop that will not lag at all and for less than the cost of a decent chromebook. This is the best laptop on the market right now. I'm about to buy a second one for myself as a backup. This laptop is incredible as-is if you intend on installing linux. Probably the best laptop you can find for a linux machine.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my school work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop (which I am typing on right now) to do my school work....I'm in a Master Program. It has every feature I needed.....speed...it boots up in perhaps 15 seconds or less. Plenty of memory. And fast. Built-in webcam and microphone that I need for my lectures. I added MS Office. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elena J. Mears

customer_reviews.title: Screen stayed black right of the box.
customer_reviews.text: In all fairness, I cannot give much of a review. I followed the instructions and plugged in the computer. The screen stayed black. I called the tech support number in the box. I was instructed to turn the computer off, then turn it on again. It still stayed black. I was advised since it was brand new to return it. I open the laptop all the way at 180 degrees and the screen would come on if I kept tapping it. It was a short in the computer. This is the second Acer product that I have purchased and have had to return because it would not operate when it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Super Pet Nanny

customer_reviews.title: The Machine I Came to Hate
customer_reviews.text: I loved the overall look and response of this laptop. Then the problems started. I'd be typing and the screen would go to black. For no apparent reason, no picture, no sound, just a black screen. The first time it happened I didn't quite believe it. Then it happened a second time. I believed I'd touched something. Then it started to happen multiple times during a session. I'm not a gamer and was taxing any of the design elements. Still black screen, back on, black screen, repeatedly. I returned the computer for another brand and model. We'll have to see how it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeweled Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is a great value. Comes with Windows 10 S(which can easily be upgraded to Home, free of charge). There is no bloatware or pre-installed nonsense. Lightning fast and has a very "premium" look. I ordered this with 32GB RAM(I do heavy photoshop work, but 16GB is plenty for most people). The included M.2 SSD is insanely fast, but you'll also definitely want to pick up an additional SSD. Installing additional hardware is painless. You only need to remove 10 screws from the bottom and everything is laid out clear and easily accessible. This was definitely made with user upgrades in mind. Very consumer friendly design.
customer_reviews.author: RLC928

customer_reviews.title: EASY off  S MODE is easily TURNED OFF.  Do not let that deter you.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and cancelled it twice. I was so afraid of the darn S Mode. I had never heard of it before and I am computer literate, so I was hesitant and kept cancelling. I think it takes maybe 4 clicks to turn it off. right from the settings you do not have to download anything. Wow. This laptop is lightning fast! I bought a new Dell laptop a month ago and it crept along. I had never experienced such terrible performance. The only thing is that the hard drive storage is not HUGE. BUt other than that, this laptop games, surfs the web with muliple windows open, and boy is it fast.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A.

customer_reviews.title: Mousepad stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The computer worked great for about 3 months then the mouse pad stopped working. Called customer support and searched videos to try and fix, but nothing worked. Now I have to pay to ship it back to see if they can fix it or get me another one. But inconvenience being without a computer - would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Horrible problem when typing
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with this Acer laptop from the very beginning. When using the keyboard, the cursor will occasionally jump to another line of text, and sometimes highlight and delete at will. Several time I've had emails I was writing completely disappear only to figure out that the email was automatically sent. In MS Word, this problem with text disappearing and cursor jumping around at will also happens. Never had this problem with any laptop I've used before. I just bought a replacement (HP) laptop and will be sending the Acer back. It's a piece of junk! If I could give it 0 stars, I'd do so. One star is far to good of a rating.
customer_reviews.author: D. Addiss

customer_reviews.title: Hardware Good/ Windows S Mode very bad
customer_reviews.text: This ships with Windows 10 S mode. What is S Mode you might ask? It means you can only install apps from Microsoft's App store. It means you can't install anything you download. It means you can't even use command prompt or powershell. And when you try to switch out of S mode, you always get an error. Seriously, do a search for, "Stuck in S Mode," before you buy this. The hardware on this laptop is fine. S Mode is weapons-grade cancer that renders the system practically unusable as shipped. Bottom line: Don't by a machine that ships with S Mode. Just don't. You'll regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer that ran windows for some tests for my education degree and this was one of the cheaper options that ticked all the boxes. Honestly, it's fantastic for the money! It's nice and big, but not bulky. The quality is great and the keypad is easy to use, along with the mouse tracking pad. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: HandyFam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy with a big screen
customer_reviews.text: This PC is a great buy. The only upgrade I made was adding 8 GB of memory to bring it up to 12 GB, which is perfect for my needs. I will be using it for the usual document editing, spread sheets, internet browsing, etc. I also opted to download the full version of Windows 10, which is a free conversion. If you just want an inexpensive, light, large-screened, quick, and reliable laptop, buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Good but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight, size speed and looks. However my unit would not resume from wake with lid opening or sleep button pressed, or power button pushed again. Keyboard would not respond during this period for about 30 seconds and then unit would do a restart and any open apps would be closed. Very annoying. Tried all the suggested remedies such as power option changes and bios updates. Even re-installed Windows and upgraded to the Pro version with no success to fix the resume from wake issue. Would not recommend as unit fails simple basic requirement. What more serious flaw may lie ahead. Returned unit for refund. Usually not this negative but this unit wasted to much of my time.
customer_reviews.author: sjg56k

customer_reviews.title: Poor storage performace
customer_reviews.text: I tried 3 of them they perform differently from each other and they appeared to have different hardware suppliers internal parts made by random manufacturers for example M.2 port is only PCIE X2 speed and advertised internal sata3 port performs about 300mb write and 500mb read on a drive rated 530mb write 550mb read. Over it looks as if it was put together in a hurry debris around plastic body can easily can cut hands skin etc.
customer_reviews.author: Senozlu1

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This computer is very speedy for everyday tasks like web surfing, word/spreadsheet processing and regular video streaming. I upgraded the Samsung internal RAM memory to 8gb for about $25, I highly recommend doing this. Not crazy about the track pad being right of center instead of dead center, but I use it with a wireless mouse, so this is not an issue for me. Keyboard is well layed out and very responsive. Screen quality is OK, but I wouldn’t recommend it for high octane gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy F

customer_reviews.title: OK build quality, good screen
customer_reviews.text: Adding hard drive and additional memory was fairly easy (take out screws from back, remember you have only one open slot for memory if you plan to keep the 4GB memory already installed). Converting win 10S to home is also very straight forward. Good IPS screen. The only thing I would complain about is the USB ports. Very tight and needing some force to pull out usb sticks, something I am afraid to eventually break the ports for the long run. Not so impressed with the overall build quality (fairly cheap material and make, obvious when I took the back cover to upgrade memory).
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Laptop For Games and Work.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for college after my last one broke and I’m so grateful. It came quick and works amazingly. I’ve had it since September 2019 and it still running smoothly (despite daily use and a few occasions of me dropping it) it’s heavy duty and forth it’s price. Also grateful that it has 3 USB plugins, it comes in handy for my phone and headphones. I play the sims 4 on here with no problem but will look to expand its storage because I want to add more games, overall great laptop. I am pleasantly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Myki118

customer_reviews.title: Fast and exellent for working from home
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of the screen, is fast very fast, I used to work in a Dell but drive me crazy how slow was. I look for days, read reviews and this laptop was in a great price and bunch of great reviews. So I bought it, surprise....super fast no complains, plus loved the big screen. I can work from home, easy, buy and search online but I have 1 complain: the letters started to get hard, the W is almost impossible to have it press, I do not know why, at the beginning was perfect. I bought a base to have it up and a protector for the keyboard so do not get worst.
customer_reviews.author: Wendita

customer_reviews.title: Warranty useless, just stopped working after about 1 month
customer_reviews.text: This laptop stopped working only a month or two after I purchased it along with the warranty. I never dropped it, spilled anything on it, did not damage it in any way. It came back with a weird looking blob on the screen and returned unrepaired eith lies about the screen being cracked, which it is not. Do not waste your money, please! Now I need to decide wh err then yo take this somewhere or buy an entire other laptop and am broke.
customer_reviews.author: Rich and Jen Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Really great laptop, even with the windows 10s (safe mode) you can easily disable that and be free. I put in a 500GB SSD and upgraded the ram to 8GB and works solid. Though battery life is average 2hrs for me with the back-lit keyboard on which I love! plays non demanding games well enough and is pretty slim. Honestly this is a surberb laptop that offers a good amount without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano L

customer_reviews.title: Junk Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I guess I'm the first one to buy a faulty laptop of this kind - with so many other positive reviews. This laptop only lasted me 5 months before the screen went completely black and now it will not turn on. It started with the screen blackening in and out while I'm in the middle of working or browsing webs. Come to find out this one had bad sensors when you open and close the laptop. And since I'm well past the return date - I have to chalk this up as a loss. Horrible quality laptop that I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D&R Vues

customer_reviews.title: A Microsoft scam.  Shame on Microsoft and shame on Acer.  ZERO stars
customer_reviews.text: The charger buzzes like a fridge and heats up A LOT. The main problem is that you can do NOTHING on your own. Nothing. Microsoft rules this computer. It's something called Microsoft S. You CAN opt out of it but it costs you money! Forget it. Want to download your favorite apps? You can't unless Microsoft lets you. And guess what? Microsoft doesn't let you . Want to download programs you wish to use on your computer? You can't unless Microsoft approves. And guess what? Microsoft doesn't approve. DO NOT BUY THIS SCAM!! Please don't. You'll send it back just like I'm about to.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Griffen

customer_reviews.title: Audio Driver went dead after two months
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this laptop. After just two months of basic usage (no gaming, no power using), I lost all audio function. No sound at all. I've adjusted the audio and volume settings, utilized the Windows Help and Support options (which are very unhelpful), updated the audio drivers, deleted and reinstalled the audio drivers, and nothing has worked. From reading online troubleshooting guides, this appears to be a somewhat common issue for users of this type of laptop. Will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the Acer 5
customer_reviews.text: The Acer 5 is a fine laptop as long as you do not need to use the speakers (extreme low volume) or use WiFi sharing (The shared WiFi connection consistently suffers interruptions); Ethernet is the only viable option for sharing internet connection from the Acer 5. Not to mention, I paid for 2 day shipping and received the Acer 5 laptop 9 days later, but that is more about Amazon's lack of order fulfillment obligations. 350.00 acer 5 + 13.00 shipping + 37.00 taxes and handling = 400.00 bad buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dewey

customer_reviews.title: difficult to charge
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has some good features, the sound and screen are excellent. The problem is that it is a nightmare to recharge. I have bought several charges which were presented as being compatible with this laptop. I even bought another one of this to make sure that I had the right charger and charger did not work well. I am very frustrated because this has a great price but the charger issue is very serious.
customer_reviews.author: history lady

customer_reviews.title: Makes great thin client for Remote Work
customer_reviews.text: This computer is in stock, and you can buy 50 at a time. Not many of those around during CoronaVirus2019. I am impressed with the 15.6" IPS 1080P display in a $350 laptop. The keyboard is decent and backlit. The trackpad is good and large, but the spacing tends to trigger accidental touches, at least or me. What really impresses me is the ability to upgrade the RAM, the SSD, add another hard drive and even replace the battery. Construction is better than expected for this price range. I only wish I could have purchased it with 8GB of ram pre-installed and it had USB-C ports. I would have paid $50 more for those two options and not regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Broke 6 weeks after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Less than two months old and the screen just completely stopped working. No damage, didn't drop it, it just broke. Troubleshooting was ineffective and tech support was extremely difficult to understand due to language barrier and heavy accent. Sent it in for repair and they wanted to charge the same price to repair it as a new computer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Decent laptop for the price and can be upgraded!
customer_reviews.text: Nice laptop however when typing the touchpad gets in the way. Came with hard drive screws so the hard drive can be upgraded also the memory can be upgraded to 32 gigs which would help out the computer tremendously
customer_reviews.author: Erik Read

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last.  Black screen of death.
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year, the screen gave the dreaded Black Screen of Death. Now I'm on the hook for a new replacement screen.
customer_reviews.author: Gearfusion

customer_reviews.title: awesome value, with just some minor nitpicks
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is an extremely good value. The screen is fantastic. After adding more RAM & 2nd drive, the laptop performs super well. Initially the screen occasionally blinks when viewing video in Chrome. But installing the generic AMD Radeon driver fixes the issue. So what's left is very minor nitpicks. 1. No dedicated 'Pg Dn' & 'End' buttons. They are part of the number pad, and needs to switch mode w/ 'Num Lock'. I really miss the extra buttons when using Excel. 2. No SD card reader 3. The 128GB M2 drive is divided into 4 partitions. With Windows being in 3rd one. So cloning things to a larger drive is a bit more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Using it now!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very tech savvy, I just wanted a basic laptop that I could get online with to check emails and social media. This laptop delivered. It's beautiful, the battery lasts forever, it was quick to set up, easy to use, and lightweight. Fantastic value for the price. I'm very happy with the quality of it and have had no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Madam Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Laptop for Online Schooling
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is for my 7th grade son, who is doing online schooling during this Coronavirus Outbreak. He was pleased with the speed of this computer compared to the ones in the school. The display is great. The sleekness and thinness of this laptop is lightweight and easy to carry. Because so many stores are closed in our area, I was pleased to find this on Amazon with 2 day shipping and at a good price. My son went from a mini iPad to a 15” Laptop for his school work. Thank goodness Amazon had this available during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Time

customer_reviews.title: Very fast, love the backlit keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This came very quickly, and I am very happy with the product. Start up is very quick, keyboard is standard size and very smooth. Love that the keyboard is backlit so it is easy to type at night. It is light and the silver metallic is really nice. I did deactivate the "S" function on WIndows 10, very simple to do, and I am able to upload whatever I choose, so no problem there. The graphics are great, colors super sharp. Just a great laptop all around.
customer_reviews.author: VRW

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want a laptop that will last longer than 9 months
customer_reviews.text: After about 9 months of light use (med student) this laptop is already shutting down on its own, freezing, and screen is not turning on (all in the absence of any viruses). It started slowly but now 9 months later the laptop is barely usable
customer_reviews.author: Jason England

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the average computer user who wants more than a Chromebook for the same price
customer_reviews.text: great laptop for my purposes! I mostly use it for school work, however it handles Minecraft and Sims 4 on the highest graphics settings perfectly. I like that the keyboard light times out so that it's not distracting while watching a movie and the speaker quality shocked me. I did decide to upgrade the RAM to 12 GB since 4 is so low. It feels very high quality and I like the aluminum cover. Overall I would recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Windows Update, Activate, then Switch Out from S-mode!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent! You need to run Windows Update first. Then, you can Activate the Windows 10 S-Mode. Finally, you can switch out from S-Mode to make it work as Windows 10 Home edition. This process is a bit confusing, but you can get excellent condition with no additional payments. Please do NOT buy a product key by mistake or misunderstanding. I hope the manufacturer or distributor could put this instruction in the box to avoid unnecessary complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Keisuke Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my basic needs.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a solid laptop. Nothing too fancy, but not bad at all. The only issue that I have with it, is that the sound is very low even with the volume all the way up. For instance, the sound of one of those cheap $20 box fans is louder than the laptop while it is directly in my face, so I'm probably gonna get a Bluetooth speaker for it. Also, it doesn't have a light to let you know if caps lock is active or not. Besides that, it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Norell Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Love the display, the keyboard, back light. It's heavier than I wanted and isn't lightening fast. The battery life is just so-so. But overall, it's maybe my favorite of laptops I own! What it lacks, it makes up for with all the ports it has, including Ethernet, which I use for my network.
customer_reviews.author: Katgo

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Use this for college. Really like the fast startup time, is ready to go in seconds, feature comes in handy when arriving late to a lecture. The recording feature is great at 25 feet. Battery is reasonable, depending the use and screen brightness, it can go 6hrs. Screen looks decent outside. I didn't like the operating system it came with, since it doesn't let you install software, only apps. But it lets you change it to Windows 10 at no additional cost, it was fast and really easy, found the instructions online. I don't have dislikes so far, it has been a great investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: CVT

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the laptop for home use . The day I opened it was too slow too start . After that I added my wifi , 10 mins later it refuses to connect to my wifi . First I thought my wifi was not working but my other connected devices were working. I tried to trouble shoot as per instructions but it was not working. And now am getting only a $297 refund but i spent $314 . Not sure where the rest of the $17 is going ??
customer_reviews.author: sarita

customer_reviews.title: Printer Hookup - Impossible
customer_reviews.text: I have probably the simplest/cheapest wireless printer HP makes. Getting the Acer Aspire to print was impossible! I spent literally multiple hours trying to get the printer to work with the Aspire laptop and worked with the Acer phone support who were basically flummoxed. The printer works fine with my desktop. The Aspire also has no slot to accept the printer CD so I had to use the HP Smart App online. Now I'm waiting for an independent technician ( from HelloTech) to come to my house to try to get it running at a cost of $103. VERY angry and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop for the money. I have bought 4 of them now. Perfect for kids school work online and just overall a great, stable running machine. I did add a 4gb ram stick to 2 of the 4 laptops. My wife is in college and has a lot going on at once sometimes so I figured the extra ram would be a good help. It didn't really need it though, I just figured why not. The 4gb ram stick was only like 20 bucks on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Guy

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is beautiful! The screen is gorgeous, the whole aluminum casing is awesome. I did a lot of research before purchasing this laptop. I wanted a lower priced option but I wanted it to not be terrible. This laptop is fast, the keyboard is comfortable to use, and I am just really impressed. It was very easy to remove it from "S" mode (and free) so if that is making you hesitate, don't worry about it. I believe this is absolutely the best laptop you can get in this price range!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are trash but has good upgradable specs
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has great specs for basic needs. You won’t find anything more reliable. It’s fast and efficient for anything but gaming. I use it for Lightroom or photography purposes and is fast. You will not be disappointed for anything but gaming. This is a laptop that will need to be upgraded. That’s a big factor on this purpose to be upgraded. The speakers are below the laptop and is garbage. I can barely stand to hear anything. I had to buy clip on speakers to hear minimal hearing. You will need to buy external speakers to be comfortable with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Householder

customer_reviews.title: two things to address
customer_reviews.text: to the reviewer that said it runs League of Legends amazing! this is simply not true. You will struggle to maintain 45fps at the bare minimum setting. Secondly, the F keys are all mapped to Acers proprietary control scheme. You need to hold the FN key to actually execute a F key input. i solved this by just packing an old usb keyboard in my work bag. It really is a nice little laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bordenave

customer_reviews.title: Wish I never bought this
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save some money buying this, had it for 2 days and now it won't even boot up. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but two problems right from the start.
customer_reviews.text: I think this laptop would be so awesome but the keyboard backlight would not stay on. The mouse pad would not work. I had to use my mouse. I don’t want issues. I need a laptop that works at 100%. Otherwise the laptop is fast and has a nice screen display. And finally. This product was shipped a box three times a big as the laptop box. No packing but two brown pieces of paper. A shame to send a breakable item this way.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me to use as a classroom teacher, in case we went virtual. We did, and the speakers are TERRIBLE. I have them turned all the way up, and this particular model does not let you adjust the sound effects. I did not want to purchase an attached speaker, but I might have to. The screen is dull and not too bright. I just am glad I am using this for nothing too major. I had to switch to my old desk top for using it in my classroom. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not for regular use. Disposable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in June and already have the screen popped out because of bad hinges. Pretty sure I don’t have any warranty on this and would not get this disposable product again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard lights up, programs load quickly, and while it's not a Chromebook (crapbook if you ask me), it's light weight! It has 3 USB ports (was not sure reading description) and even though the sound isn't great my speakers sound great. I hate Windows operating system but that has little to nothing to do with the laptop. It stays charged pretty decently. I haven't timed it. Overall, for the price, I think it's great. I social stream once a week without issue. I use my own webcam, so I can't comment on the internal cam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
